text: "Virginia Plain" is a 1972 debut single by English rock band Roxy Music. It did not appear on their debut studio but it did appear on the CD version of their debut studio album. It went to number 11 in the United Kingdom and was used in the 1998 movie Velvet Goldmine. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Roxy Music songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Virginia Plain
